title: #94 - Hotline Edition: I Want My FWB to be Something More…
description:
This week, Maria is here to answer your questions on another edition of the Ask a Matchmaker Hotline! If you want to talk to Maria on an upcoming hotline episode, be sure to follow her on Instagram to know when the hotline will be open again. http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

On this week’s episode, Maria digs into…

  • Can you go from being a friend with benefits with someone to dating them?
  • My next date with him is at his house to watch sports and I’m not a sports fan. What should I do?
  • How do you talk to a potential dating partner about their values?
  • How am I supposed to take it when people take days to respond to messages on dating apps?
  • The way he’s been communicating has changed. I’m so confused.
  • I’m a single mom. What’s the balance between keeping dates fun and sharing about my life?

If you’d like to receive a Dating Assessment with Agape Match’s Louie Felix, use the link to book a time/day that is most convenient for you. https://calendly.com/felix-louie/dating-assessment  

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
